Key Match Events: Junior Olaitan scored for Benin after a defensive mix-up
Steve Mounié scored from a corner for Benin
Nigeria could not find an equaliser despite dominating in the second half
Post-Match Reflections: Stanley Nwabali showed composure but was disappointed not to keep a clean sheet
Bright Osayi-Samuel had a poor game with unforced errors
Calvin Bassey and Semi Ajayi will want to forget their performances
Alex Iwobi did not perform well and failed to track back
Benjamin Tanimu had a forgettable game
Wilfred Ndidi was not at his best
Terem Moffi did not perform well
Raphael Onyedika was the best player for Nigeria with decent tackles and passes
Paul Onuachu did not get the supplies he usually thrives on
Ibrahim Olawoyin made his debut but could not help Nigeria
Ismaila Sodiq made a couple of crosses that were not utilised
Alhassan Yusuf had a cameo but nothing noteworthy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Félix Houphouët-Boigny Stadium in Abidjan
Nigeria led through Raphael Onyedika's goal in the 27th minute
